document.full_text: an environmental group said on wednesday that nearly half of the violations in the marcellus shale natural gas formation last year were committed by companies whose representatives sit on governor tom corbett's marcellus advisory commission.
document.title: group says pa. governor advisers tied to shale problems
lines_and_colors: an environmental group said on wednesday that nearly half of the violations in the marcellus shale natural gas formation last year were committed by companies whose representatives sit on governor tom corbett's marcellus advisory commission.
